statements: SELECT * FROM visitation_schedule WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_id, child_id, visitation_date FROM visitation_schedule WHERE visitation_id = 3;
SELECT visitation_id, visitation_date, visitation_duration FROM visitation_schedule WHERE child_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM visitation_schedule WHERE visitation_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT visitation_id, parent_id, child_id, visitation_date FROM visitation_schedule WHERE parent_id = 1 ORDER BY visitation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitation_schedule WHERE visitation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_id, child_id, visitation_date FROM visitation_schedule WHERE visitation_duration > '2 hours';
SELECT parent_id, child_id, visitation_date FROM visitation_schedule WHERE visitation_duration < '1 day';
SELECT parent_id, child_id, visitation_date FROM visitation_schedule WHERE parent_id = 123 AND child_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM visitation_schedule WHERE visitation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND visitation_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM ParentVisitationSchedule WHERE parent_id = 1
SELECT child_name, birth_date FROM Child WHERE child_id = 2
SELECT visitation_time, visitation_date FROM ParentVisitationSchedule WHERE child_id = 3
SELECT parent_id, child_id FROM ParentVisitationSchedule WHERE visitation_date = '2022-05-12'
SELECT child_name, birth_date, child_id FROM Child WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2015-12-31'
SELECT * FROM ParentVisitationSchedule ORDER BY parent_id, visitation_date DESC, visitation_time ASC;
SELECT parent_id, child_id, COUNT(*) AS num_visits FROM ParentVisitationSchedule GROUP BY parent_id, child_id HAVING num_visits > 1;
SELECT child_id, child_name FROM Child WHERE birth_date < '2010-01-01';
SELECT parent_id, child_id, visitation_date, visitation_time FROM ParentVisitationSchedule WHERE parent_id = 2 AND visitation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT parent_id FROM ParentVisitationSchedule;
SELECT * FROM VisitationSchedule;
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM Parent WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT visitation_id, visitation_date FROM VisitationSchedule WHERE parent_id = 1 ORDER BY visitation_date DESC;
SELECT visitation_date, child_name FROM VisitationSchedule JOIN Child ON VisitationSchedule.child_id = Child.child_id;
SELECT parent_name, child_name FROM Parent JOIN Child ON Parent.parent_id = Child.child_id;
SELECT * FROM VisitationSchedule WHERE visitation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visitation_date DESC, parent_id ASC, child_id ASC
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, phone_number FROM Parent WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY parent_name ASC
SELECT child_id, child_name, birth_date FROM Child WHERE birth_date < '2010-01-01' ORDER BY child_name DESC

SELECT parent.parent_name, child.child_name, vs.visitation_date FROM Parent AS parent INNER JOIN VisitationSchedule AS vs ON parent.parent_id = vs.parent_id INNER JOIN Child as child ON vs.child_id = child.child_id ORDER BY vs.visitation_date ASC

SELECT vs.visitation_id, parent.parent_name as parent_name, child.child_name as child_name, vs.visitation_date FROM VisitationSchedule AS vs LEFT JOIN Parent AS parent ON vs.parent_id = parent.parent_id LEFT JOIN Child as child ON vs.child_id = child.child_id ORDER BY vs.visitation_id DESC
SELECT * FROM parent;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name FROM parent ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name FROM parent WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT child_name FROM child WHERE child_id = 2;
SELECT parent_id, child_id, visitation_date FROM parent_schedule WHERE visitation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, child_name, visitation_date FROM parent_schedule INNER JOIN parent ON parent_schedule.parent_id = parent.parent_id INNER JOIN child ON parent_schedule.child_id = child.child_id;
SELECT * FROM parent_schedule WHERE visitation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, COUNT(*) AS visitation_count FROM parent_schedule INNER JOIN parent ON parent_schedule.parent_id = parent.parent_id GROUP BY parent_name;
SELECT child_name, AVG(visitation_duration) AS avg_duration FROM visitation_log INNER JOIN child ON visitation_log.child_id = child.child_id GROUP BY child_name HAVING avg_duration > '00:30:00';

SELECT parent.parent_name, child.child_name, visitation_date FROM parent_schedule JOIN parent ON parent_schedule.parent_id = parent.parent_id LEFT JOIN child ON parent_schedule.child_id = child.child_id ORDER BY visitation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, parent_email FROM Parent;
SELECT child_id, child_name, child_dob FROM Child ORDER BY child_dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM Visitation WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT parent_name, week_day, time_slot FROM Schedule JOIN Parent ON Schedule.parent_id = Parent.parent_id;
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone FROM Parent ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT child_name, child_dob FROM Child WHERE child_dob > '2010-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, child_name, start_date, end_date FROM Parent JOIN Visitation ON Parent.parent_id = Visitation.parent_id;
SELECT parent_name, week_day, time_slot FROM Parent JOIN Schedule ON Parent.parent_id = Schedule.parent_id ORDER BY week_day ASC, time_slot DESC;
